wallet.noSupportedWalletsSafari: We're sorry, but there are no supported wallets for Safari. Please use a different browser.
wallet.noWalletsInstalled: It looks like you have no wallet extensions installed. Please install one of the following wallets to continue.
wallet.alreadyDelegating: You are already delegating to this pool.
wallet.authTokenDescription: We use a signature token to protect your privacy and keep your watchlist, custom names, and personal data secure.
wallet.authTokenWarning: If you cancel or remove the authorization token, we cannot connect your wallet.
wallet.securityLevelTooltip: Strong security restricts token usage to your current IP address only.

adaPrice.fdvTooltip: Fully Diluted Valuation = ADA price × max supply ({{maxSupply}})
adaPrice.circulatingSupplyTooltip: ADA currently in circulation (not locked or unminted)
adaPrice.totalSupplyTooltip: The maximum number of ADA that will ever exist ({{maxSupply}})
adaPrice.adaStakedTooltip: ADA delegated to stake pools (out of circulating supply)
adaPrice.adaBtcPriceVsTvl: ADA/BTC Price vs Total Value Locked (TVL)
adaPrice.adaBtcPriceVsActiveAddresses: ADA/BTC Price vs Daily Active Addresses
adaPrice.adaBtcPriceVsTxVolume: ADA/BTC Price vs Daily TX Output Volume

address.differentStakeKey: This address belongs to a different stake key than you're currently viewing.
address.labelLimitFree: You can only add 10 labels with the free version of Cexplorer
address.labelLimitPro: You can only add 100 labels per NFT with the PRO version of Cexplorer

analytics.notDelegatedToPool: Not delegated to a stake pool
analytics.accountsExcluded: Accounts with less than 100,000 ADA were excluded from this list.
analytics.walletsDescription: First-time-active and unique wallets with a transaction record in the selected period
analytics.tpsDescription: Visual expression of all transactions on the Cardano network in time.
analytics.blocksDescription: Visual expression of blocks created by all stake pools over epochs.
analytics.blockSizeDescription: The average size of blocks in kilobytes over epochs.
analytics.networkHealthDescription: Visual expression of network health based on block production efficiency.
analytics.networkStorageDescription: Cumulative size of the blockchain over time.
analytics.energyConsumptionDescription: Estimated energy consumption of the Cardano network.
analytics.blockVersionsDescription: Distribution of block versions across the network.
analytics.missedBlocksDescription: Blocks that were expected but not produced by stake pools.
analytics.averagePoolDescription: Statistics about the average stake pool on Cardano.
analytics.blockProductionDescription: Visual expression of block production on Cardano
analytics.blockSizeUsedDescription: This graph tracks the average block size on Cardano over time, highlighting how the network is currently utilizing the 88KB maximum block size capacity.
analytics.txInEpochDescription: Visual expression of all transactions on the Cardano network in time.
analytics.totalNetworkStorageDescription: Total storage needed for all records of Cardano network
analytics.cardanoVsBitcoinDescription: Overview: This comparison examines the energy efficiency advantages of Cardano's proof-of-stake consensus over Bitcoin's proof-of-work model.
analytics.cardanoEnergyConsumptionDescription: Overview: This graph monitors total amount of operated stake pool and their energy consumption.
analytics.latestNodeVersionDescription: This page provides insights into Cardano's hard fork events by analyzing the last block minted by each active staking pool with a minimum of one block produced per epoch.
analytics.poolSupportingSignalDescription: Shows stake pools ordered by stake, showing the node version they run
analytics.latestBlocksVersionsDescription: Reflects the node version under which each recent block was minted
analytics.poolIssuesEstimateDescription: This estimate is based on pool performance data. Pools don't always achieve their expected block allocation per epoch. Smaller pools may vary between 50% and 200% of expected performance. The feature is being optimized to account for these fluctuations.
analytics.csvDescription: Great for easy viewing in spreadsheet tools.
analytics.pngDescription: Ideal for sharing high-quality images with lossless compression.
analytics.chainDensityDescription: Reflects the overall health and consistency of block production, with an ideal chain density target of around 5% based on the network's parameters.

asset.userGeneratedContentDescription: Following content is user-generated and unmoderated by the Cexplorer team.
asset.atLeastOneRuleMustBeMet: At least one rule must be met
asset.atLeastNRulesMustBeMet: At least {{count}} rules must be met
asset.noDataAvailable: No data available for selected period
asset.name: Name

cc.name: Name
cc.recentActivityTooltip: CC member's voting activity over the past 6 months
cc.lifetimeActivityTooltip: Voting activity over CC member's lifetime

voting.activityTooltip: Voting activity across treasury withdrawal proposals

thresholds.ccTooltip: Minimum number of CC members required to approve this proposal.
thresholds.ccNotVoting: CC Members do not vote on this action
thresholds.drepTooltip: Theoretical minimum number of DReps with enough voting power to pass this proposal
thresholds.drepNotVoting: DReps do not vote on this action
thresholds.spoTooltipSecurity: Theoretical minimum number of SPOs with enough stake to pass this proposal. SPOs only vote if the parameter is a security parameter.
thresholds.spoTooltip: Theoretical number of SPOs with enough stake to pass this proposal.
thresholds.spoNotVoting: SPOs do not vote on this action
thresholds.totalTooltipParameter: Theoretical minimum number of entities (CC, DReps, SPOs) needed to pass this governance action. If the parameter is a security parameter, SPO votes (orange) are also included.
thresholds.totalTooltip: Theoretical minimum number of entities (CC, DReps, SPOs) needed to pass this governance action.
thresholds.minCCNeeded: Minimum CC members needed to pass

overview.title: Title
overview.thresholdTooltip: Minimum percentage of Constitutional Committee members required to approve this governance action
overview.drepsNotVoting: DReps are not voting on this governance action
overview.sposNotVoting: SPOs are not voting on this governance action

statusHistory.submitted: Governance action submitted to the blockchain.
statusHistory.active: Voting period has started. Governance bodies can now vote.
statusHistory.ratified: Proposal passed the vote check at the epoch boundary. It will be enacted in the next epoch.
statusHistory.enacted: Proposal's changes applied on-chain at the epoch boundary.
statusHistory.expired: Voting period has ended without reaching the required threshold.
statusHistory.dropped: Proposal withdrawn before the vote check.

vote.lateVoteWarning: This vote was submitted after voting closed

geekConfig.preferencesDescription: Select preferences for your best experience on Cexplorer.
geekConfig.displayHandlesDescription: Show readable $Handles instead of full wallet addresses where available.
geekConfig.displayAdaTooltipsDescription: Show tooltip amounts in ADA rather than lovelace
geekConfig.sortUtxosDescription: Sort UTxOs shown in transaction details by their index or value.

shortcuts.description: Navigate Cexplorer like a PRO with shortcuts.

dex.multiplePairsDetected: Multiple pairs detected - see individual trades below

api.manageAndMonitor: Manage and monitor your Cexplorer API keys usage.
api.connectToAccess: Connect your wallet to access API dashboard and manage your API keys.
api.noProjects: You don't have any projects yet.
api.startNewProject: Start a new project to generate a new API keys, monitor your usage, and track your data.
api.limitsDescription: API limits based on your plan. You can increase the limits by upgrading your / by holding more Cexplorer PRO NFTs.
api.nftsHeldTooltip: This address holds {{count}} Cexplorer PRO NFTs.
api.limitsBoostTooltip: Your limits are {{count}}x the base limits in Basic API program.
api.apiKeysDescription: Your project's API key. You can regenerate the key at any time (disables the original key).
api.apiUsageDescription: Overview of the requests amount in time.

labels.title: Custom labels
labels.description: Easily rename any address with custom text for better tracking and organization.
labels.connectToAccess: Connect your wallet to create and manage custom labels for addresses.
labels.freeLimitTooltip: You can only add 10 labels with the free version of Cexplorer
labels.proLimitTooltip: You can only add 100 labels per NFT with the PRO version of Cexplorer
labels.label: Label

pro.connectToAccess: Connect your wallet to access your Cexplorer PRO features and manage your NFTs.
pro.promotionDescription: Feature Stake Pools, DReps, policy IDs and assets across Cexplorer.
pro.displayFrequency: The displaying frequency is increased with each NFT delegated.
pro.noNftsOwned: You don't own any Cexplorer PRO NFTs yet.
pro.getOneToUnlock: Get one to unlock PRO features like boosting, API, governance votes, and more.
pro.removeFromWatchlist: Do you wish to remove this item from your watchlist?
pro.modifyTooltip: You can only modify your NFT once in 24 hours. Unlocks {{time}}

settings.title: Profile settings
settings.description: Update your profile picture photo and details here.
settings.connectToAccess: Connect your wallet to access and manage your profile settings.
settings.publicProfileDescription: When turned on, users will see your profile information on your wallet address detail.
settings.usernameDescription: This will be displayed on your wallet address only if profile is public.
settings.profilePictureDescription: Update your profile picture to be easily recognized.
settings.socialProfilesDescription: Social profiles will be visible on you address detail only when profile is public.

errors.xcom: Username can contain letters, numbers, and underscores, up to 30 characters.
errors.telegram: Telegram username must be 5-32 characters and can contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
errors.discord: Discord username must be in the format "username" or "username#digits".
errors.patreon: Patreon username must be 3-50 characters and can contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
errors.facebook: Facebook username must be 5-50 characters and can contain letters, numbers, and dots.
errors.instagram: Instagram username cannot have consecutive dots or start/end with a dot, up to 30 characters.
errors.github: GitHub username must be 1-39 characters, cannot start/end with a hyphen, and can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens.
errors.linkedin: LinkedIn username must be 3-100 characters and can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens.

stats.uniqueUsersInPastEpoch: Unique users in the past epoch

tvl.title: TVL
tvl.subtitle: (total value locked)
tvl.description: In the context of decentralized finance (DeFi), it represents the total amount of cryptocurrency assets that are currently staked or deposited in a particular protocol or smart contract.

modal.title: Donate to Cardano Treasury
modal.description: Support the Cardano ecosystem by donating to the treasury. You can also choose to support Cexplorer development.
modal.commentPlaceholder: Add an optional message to your donation
modal.sliderDescription: Adjust the slider to split your donation between the Cardano Treasury and Cexplorer development.
modal.meshJsNote: Note: MeshJS does not support treasury donations yet. You can donate only to Cexplorer for now.

tooltips.upper: Optimistic return estimate (+10% above recent ROA)
tooltips.actual: Return based on pool's recent ROA performance
tooltips.lower: Conservative return estimate (-10% below recent ROA)

tooltips.incompleteMonth: This month may be incomplete due to data limit
tooltips.exchangeRatesEpoch: Exchange rates from the epoch end date.
tooltips.exchangeRatesWithdrawal: Exchange rates from the withdrawal date.
